languages.text: "Пара подосланных мной агентов носила такой на форме, когда Калькасар заинтересовался делами Ее Светлости Теодоры. Не очень долго, впрочем — после того, как я вручила Теодоре ультиматум Калькасара, она вычистила из свиты всех наших агентов. Кажется, она хотела заполучить и мою голову, но Лорд-инквизитор отозвал меня сюда, сторожить пещеру с сокровищами. На случай, если Теодора вернется забрать свое, ну, или друкари начнут баловаться".

"Oh, I should know. It was on the uniform my agents wore. The ones I sent when Calcazar took an interest in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. They didn't wear them for long, though: when I presented Theodora with Calcazar's ultimatum, she purged her retinue of our operatives. I'm fairly certain Theodora would have preferred to have my head as well, but the Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard his treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to return for what she thought was hers, or the Drukhari started causing trouble."
languages.original_text: "Пара подосланных мной агентов носила такой на форме, когда Калькасар заинтересовался делами Ее Светлости Теодоры. Не очень долго, впрочем — после того, как я вручила Теодоре ультиматум Калькасара, она вычистила из свиты всех наших агентов. Кажется, она хотела заполучить и мою голову, но Лорд-инквизитор отозвал меня сюда, сторожить пещеру с сокровищами. На случай, если Теодора вернется забрать свое, ну, или друкари начнут баловаться".

traits.locale_text: "Well, you know, I wore one just like this on my uniform when Calcazar had planted me in Her Ladyship's retinue. Not for long though — just until I betrayed her and her with Calcazar's ultimatum. Theodora tried to shoot me dead. I think she wasn't happy to have me on her ship, and Lord Inquisitor recalled me here, to guard the treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decides to take back her belongings or the Drukhari start messing around."

"Well, you know, I wore one just like this on my uniform when Calcazar had planted me in Her Ladyship's retinue. Not for long though — just until I betrayed her and her with Calcazar's ultimatum. Theodora tried to shoot me dead. I think she wasn't happy to have me on her ship, and Lord Inquisitor recalled me here, to guard the treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decides to take back her belongings or the Drukhari start messing around."

"Well, you know, I wore one just like this on my uniform when Calcazar got me infiltrated in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. Not for long, though: just until I betrayed her and presented her with Calcazar's ultimatum. Theodora tried to shoot me dead. I think she wasn't happy to have me on her ship and Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard the treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to take back her belongings or the Drukhari started messing around."

"Well, you know, I wore one just like this on my uniform when Calcazar got me infiltrated in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. Not for long, though: just until I betrayed her and presented her with Calcazar's ultimatum. Theodora tried to shoot me dead. I think she wasn't happy to have me on her ship and Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard the treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to take back her belongings or the Drukhari started messing around."

"Oh, I should know. It was on the uniform my agents wore. The ones I sent when Calcazar took an interest in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. They didn't wear them for long, though: when I presented Theodora with Calcazar's ultimatum, she purged her retinue of our operatives. I'm fairly certain Theodora would have preferred to have my head as well, but the Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard his treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to return for what she thought was hers, or the Drukhari started causing trouble."

"Oh, I should know. It was on the uniform my agents wore. The ones I sent when Calcazar took an interest in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. They didn't wear them for long, though: when I presented Theodora with Calcazar's ultimatum, she purged her retinue of our operatives. I'm fairly certain Theodora would have preferred to have my head as well, but the Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard his treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to return for what she thought was hers, or the Drukhari started causing trouble."

languages.text: « Oh, je les connais très bien. Mes agents avaient le même symbole sur leur uniforme, ceux que j'ai envoyés en mission quand Calcazar s'est pris d'intérêt pour l'entourage de dame Théodora. Ils ne l'ont pas porté longtemps, cependant : lorsque j'ai transmis l'ultimatum de Calcazar à Sa Seigneurie, elle s'est débarrassée de tous nos agents. J'imagine qu'elle aurait aimé me faire disparaître également, mais le seigneur inquisiteur m'a rappelée ici pour protéger la grotte au trésor, juste au cas où Théodora déciderait de venir reprendre ce qu'elle croyait être son bien ou que les Drukharis commencent à causer des problèmes. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, I should know. It was on the uniform my agents wore. The ones I sent when Calcazar took an interest in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. They didn't wear them for long, though: when I presented Theodora with Calcazar's ultimatum, she purged her retinue of our operatives. I'm fairly certain Theodora would have preferred to have my head as well, but the Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard his treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to return for what she thought was hers, or the Drukhari started causing trouble."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, je les connais très bien. Mes agents avaient le même symbole sur leur uniforme, ceux que j'ai envoyés en mission quand Calcazar s'est pris d'intérêt pour l'entourage de dame Théodora. Ils ne l'ont pas porté longtemps, cependant : lorsque j'ai transmis l'ultimatum de Calcazar à Sa Seigneurie, elle s'est débarrassée de tous nos agents. J'imagine qu'elle aurait aimé me faire disparaître également, mais le seigneur inquisiteur m'a rappelée ici pour protéger la grotte au trésor, juste au cas où Théodora déciderait de venir reprendre ce qu'elle croyait être son bien ou que les Drukharis commencent à causer des problèmes. »

languages.text: «Ah, lo sé. Mis agentes llevaban una igualita en el uniforme; los mismos que envié cuando Calcazar se empezó a interesar en el séquito de lady Theodora. Aunque no la llevaron por mucho tiempo: solo hasta que le presenté a Theodora el ultimátum de Calcazar y purgó a todos nuestros agentes. Sospecho que se quedó con ganas de mi cabeza, pero el Lord Inquisidor me convocó aquí para custodiar la cueva del tesoro. Por si a Theodora le daba por recuperar sus pertenencias o a los Drukhari por liarla».
languages.original_text: "Oh, I should know. It was on the uniform my agents wore. The ones I sent when Calcazar took an interest in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. They didn't wear them for long, though: when I presented Theodora with Calcazar's ultimatum, she purged her retinue of our operatives. I'm fairly certain Theodora would have preferred to have my head as well, but the Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard his treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to return for what she thought was hers, or the Drukhari started causing trouble."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, ya sabe, llevaba una igualita en el uniforme cuando Calcazar quiso que me infiltrara en el séquito de lady Theodora. Aunque no por mucho tiempo: solo hasta que la traicioné y le presenté el ultimátum de Calcazar. Theodora me quiso meter una bala entre ceja y ceja. Creo que no le hacía gracia tenerme a bordo y el Lord Inquisidor me convocó aquí para custodiar la cueva del tesoro. Por si a Theodora le daba por recuperar sus pertenencias o a los Drukhari por liarla».

languages.text: “噢，我确实知道，因为我手下的特工穿的制服上就有这样的纹章，就是我派到西奥多拉夫人身边的那些特工，因为卡尔卡扎对她的随行人员非常感兴趣。不过，那些人没戴多久就是了，因为当我把卡尔卡扎的最后通牒交给西奥多拉夫人之后，她很快就把我的特工全都清理干净了。我很确定，她也想砍了我的脑袋，但大审判官却把我叫了回来，让我看守他这堆宝物，以免西奥多拉打算拿回属于她的东西，或是黑暗灵族打算惹麻烦之类的。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, I should know. It was on the uniform my agents wore. The ones I sent when Calcazar took an interest in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. They didn't wear them for long, though: when I presented Theodora with Calcazar's ultimatum, she purged her retinue of our operatives. I'm fairly certain Theodora would have preferred to have my head as well, but the Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard his treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to return for what she thought was hers, or the Drukhari started causing trouble."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，卡尔卡扎让我混入西奥多拉夫人身边的时候，我当时的制服上也绣着这样的纹章。不过我没待太久，因为我很快就背叛了她，把卡尔卡扎的最后通牒交给了她。西奥多拉想开枪打死我，我猜，她应该不怎么喜欢我呆在她的船上。后来，审判长把我叫了回来，让我看守这堆宝物，以免西奥多拉打算拿回属于她的东西，或是黑暗灵族打算捣乱之类的。”

languages.text: 「ああ、知っているとも。私の工作員が身につけていた制服さ。カルカサルがシオドーラの従者に興味を持った時に潜入させた奴らだ。まあ、着ていた期間はそんなに長い期間なかったと思うよ。私がカルカサルの最後通牒を突きつけたとき、シオドーラは私達の工作員を粛清したんだ。シオドーラは私の首も欲しがってたみたいだけど、ロード・インクィジターは宝の洞窟を守るために私をここに呼び戻した。万が一シオドーラが自分の物だと認識していた物を取り返すことにしたり、デュカーリがちょっかいを出したりした時のためにね」
languages.original_text: "Oh, I should know. It was on the uniform my agents wore. The ones I sent when Calcazar took an interest in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. They didn't wear them for long, though: when I presented Theodora with Calcazar's ultimatum, she purged her retinue of our operatives. I'm fairly certain Theodora would have preferred to have my head as well, but the Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard his treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to return for what she thought was hers, or the Drukhari started causing trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、知っているとも。私の工作員が身につけていた制服さ。カルカサルがシオドーラの従者に興味を持った時に潜入させた奴らだ。まあ、着ていた期間はそんなに長い期間なかったと思うよ。私がカルカサルの最後通牒を突きつけたとき、シオドーラは私達の工作員を粛清したんだ。シオドーラは私の首も欲しがってたみたいだけど、ロード・インクィジターは宝の洞窟を守るために私をここに呼び戻した。万が一シオドーラが自分の物だと認識していた物を取り返すことにしたり、デュカーリがちょっかいを出したりした時のためにね」

languages.text: "Oh, ich sollte es wissen. Es war auf der Uniform, die meine Agenten trugen. Die Agenten, die ich entsandte, als sich Calcazar für das Gefolge von Ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora interessierte. Sie trugen sie allerdings nicht sonderlich lange. Als ich Theodora Calcazars Ultimatum überbrachte, entfernte sie unsere Leute aus ihrer Entourage. Ich bin mir ziemlich sicher, dass Theodora auch mich liebend gerne enthauptet hätte, aber der Großinquisitor beorderte mich hierher zurück, um seine Schatzhöhle zu bewachen. Nur für den Fall, dass Theodora zurückkehrte, um sich zu nehmen, was in ihren Augen ihr gehörte ... oder die Drukhari Ärger machten."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I should know. It was on the uniform my agents wore. The ones I sent when Calcazar took an interest in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. They didn't wear them for long, though: when I presented Theodora with Calcazar's ultimatum, she purged her retinue of our operatives. I'm fairly certain Theodora would have preferred to have my head as well, but the Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard his treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to return for what she thought was hers, or the Drukhari started causing trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Tja, wisst Ihr, genau so etwas habe ich an meiner Uniform getragen, als Calcazar mich das Gefolge ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora hat infiltrieren lassen. Aber nicht lang. Nur, bis ich sie verraten und ihr Calcazars Ultimatum präsentiert habe. Theodora hat versucht, mich zu erschießen. Sie war wohl nicht sehr froh darüber, mich an Bord ihres Schiffs zu haben, und der Großinquisitor hat mich hierher zurückgerufen, um die Schatzhöhle zu bewachen. Nur für den Fall, dass Theodora zurückkommt, um ihren Besitz zurückzufordern, oder dass die Drukhari auf dumme Gedanken kommen."

languages.text: "Tanırım tabii. Ajanlarımın giydiği üniformalarda vardı. Calcazar, Leydi Theodora Hazreetleri'nin maiyetiyle ilgilenirken gönderdiğim ajanların yani. Gerçi o armayı uzun süre taşımadılar. Theodora'ya Calcazar'ın ültimatomunu ilettiğimde maiyetinden bizim ajanlarımızı çıkardı. Eminim Theodora benim kellemi de almak isterdi ama Lord Engizisyoncu, hazine mağarasını korumam için beni buraya geri çağırdı. Theodora kendisinin olduğunu düşündüğü şeyi almaya gelirse ya da Drukhariler sorun çıkarmaya başlarsa diye."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I should know. It was on the uniform my agents wore. The ones I sent when Calcazar took an interest in Her Ladyship Theodora's retinue. They didn't wear them for long, though: when I presented Theodora with Calcazar's ultimatum, she purged her retinue of our operatives. I'm fairly certain Theodora would have preferred to have my head as well, but the Lord Inquisitor recalled me here to guard his treasure cave. Just in case Theodora decided to return for what she thought was hers, or the Drukhari started causing trouble."
